title: Are the Sri Lankan Education Authorities asleep : Teachers abusing children and rising children misbehavior
content: Education authorities may like to when handing over appointment letters to teachers also give them a copy of the Sri Lanka Penal Code (Amended) wherein Section 308a states that cruelty against children causing hurt, grievous or simple as well as torture is a criminal offence.
